column4: Good day, I'm having some trouble with Bluetooth dialup on ubuntu 9.10, anyone that can give a guy a hand?
bluetooth dial up, ? via modem or gprs?
someone here posted me a step by step guide to get my dialup going
tried it last night for a couple of hours
it seems like when i create all the scripts and startup files, and I restart my bluetooth service, it doesn't recognise the rfcomm channels/devices
you may need to manually bind rfcon 0
this is what i had to do to get gprs ppp https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/bluez/+bug/416056
koshare: can i paste something in aprv msg to you quickly, don't wanna flood the channel
